title: Find a Case Study for a Trend Story
description: A reporter is writing about a national economic trend (e.g., inflation) and needs to find a local person or family to serve as a case study.

tasks.description: Post a call-out on social media and community forums asking for people willing to speak about their experience with the trend.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a pool of potential sources.

tasks.description: Vet the responses, looking for articulate individuals whose stories are representative of the broader trend.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the most suitable candidate for the case study.

tasks.description: Contact the selected person to schedule an in-depth interview.
